sourcesContent:
const drugs = [
    // Cardiovascular Drugs
    { brand: 'Prinivil, Zestril', generic: 'Lisinopril', category: 'Cardiovascular - RAAS' },
    { brand: 'Prinzide, Zestoretic', generic: 'Lisinopril/hydrochlorothiazide', category: 'Cardiovascular - RAAS' },
    { brand: 'Vasotec', generic: 'Enalapril', category: 'Cardiovascular - RAAS' },
    { brand: 'Altace', generic: 'Ramipril', category: 'Cardiovascular - RAAS' },
    { brand: 'Cozaar', generic: 'Losartan', category: 'Cardiovascular - RAAS' },
    { brand: 'Benicar', generic: 'Olmesartan', category: 'Cardiovascular - RAAS' },
    { brand: 'Diovan', generic: 'Valsartan', category: 'Cardiovascular - RAAS' },

    { brand: 'Tenormin', generic: 'Atenolol', category: 'Cardiovascular - Beta Blockers' },
    { brand: 'Lopressor', generic: 'Metoprolol tartrate', category: 'Cardiovascular - Beta Blockers' },
    { brand: 'Toprol XL', generic: 'Metoprolol succinate', category: 'Cardiovascular - Beta Blockers' },
    { brand: 'Bystolic', generic: 'Nebivolol', category: 'Cardiovascular - Beta Blockers' },
    { brand: 'Inderal', generic: 'Propranolol', category: 'Cardiovascular - Beta Blockers' },
    { brand: 'Coreg', generic: 'Carvedilol', category: 'Cardiovascular - Beta Blockers' },

    { brand: 'Procardia XL', generic: 'Nifedipine XL', category: 'Cardiovascular - Calcium Channel Blockers' },
    { brand: 'Norvasc', generic: 'Amlodipine', category: 'Cardiovascular - Calcium Channel Blockers' },
    { brand: 'Lotrel', generic: 'Amlodipine/benazepril', category: 'Cardiovascular - Calcium Channel Blockers' },
    { brand: 'Cardizem CD', generic: 'Diltiazem', category: 'Cardiovascular - Calcium Channel Blockers' },

    { brand: 'Microzide', generic: 'Hydrochlorothiazide', category: 'Cardiovascular - Diuretics' },
    { brand: 'Zaroxolyn', generic: 'Metolazone', category: 'Cardiovascular - Diuretics' },
    { brand: 'Lasix', generic: 'Furosemide', category: 'Cardiovascular - Diuretics' },
    { brand: 'Demadex', generic: 'Torsemide', category: 'Cardiovascular - Diuretics' },
    { brand: 'Bumex', generic: 'Bumetanide', category: 'Cardiovascular - Diuretics' },
    { brand: 'Aldactone', generic: 'Spironolactone', category: 'Cardiovascular - Diuretics' },

    { brand: 'Pravachol', generic: 'Pravastatin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Statins' },
    { brand: 'Zocor', generic: 'Simvastatin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Statins' },
    { brand: 'Vytorin', generic: 'Simvastatin/ezetimibe', category: 'Cardiovascular - Statins' },
    { brand: 'Lipitor', generic: 'Atorvastatin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Statins' },
    { brand: 'Crestor', generic: 'Rosuvastatin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Statins' },

    { brand: 'Tricor', generic: 'Fenofibrate', category: 'Cardiovascular - Dyslipidemia' },
    { brand: 'Lopid', generic: 'Gemfibrozil', category: 'Cardiovascular - Dyslipidemia' },
    { brand: 'Lovaza', generic: 'Omega-3 Acid Ethyl Esters', category: 'Cardiovascular - Dyslipidemia' },
    { brand: 'Niaspan', generic: 'Niacin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Dyslipidemia' },
    { brand: 'Zetia', generic: 'Ezetimibe', category: 'Cardiovascular - Dyslipidemia' },
    { brand: 'Welchol', generic: 'Colesevelam', category: 'Cardiovascular - Dyslipidemia' },

    { brand: 'Aspirin', generic: 'Aspirin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Antiplatelets' },
    { brand: 'Aggrenox', generic: 'Aspirin/Dipyridamole', category: 'Cardiovascular - Antiplatelets' },
    { brand: 'Plavix', generic: 'Clopidogrel', category: 'Cardiovascular - Antiplatelets' },
    { brand: 'Effient', generic: 'Prasugrel', category: 'Cardiovascular - Antiplatelets' },
    { brand: 'Brilinta', generic: 'Ticagrelor', category: 'Cardiovascular - Antiplatelets' },

    { brand: 'Coumadin', generic: 'Warfarin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Traditional Anticoagulants' },
    { brand: 'Lovenox', generic: 'Enoxaparin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Traditional Anticoagulants' },

    { brand: 'Pradaxa', generic: 'Dabigatran', category: 'Cardiovascular - NOACs' },
    { brand: 'Xarelto', generic: 'Rivaroxaban', category: 'Cardiovascular - NOACs' },
    { brand: 'Eliquis', generic: 'Apixaban', category: 'Cardiovascular - NOACs' },

    { brand: 'Nitrostat', generic: 'Nitroglycerin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Antianginals' },
    { brand: 'Imdur', generic: 'Isosorbide mononitrate', category: 'Cardiovascular - Antianginals' },
    { brand: 'Ranexa', generic: 'Ranolazine', category: 'Cardiovascular - Antianginals' },

    { brand: 'Cordarone, Pacerone', generic: 'Amiodarone', category: 'Cardiovascular - Other Agents' },
    { brand: 'Lanoxin', generic: 'Digoxin', category: 'Cardiovascular - Other Agents' },
];
